document.full_text: nbc news is expected to announce on monday that ann curry will become co-host of its morning television show "today," according to the new york times.
document.title: nbc news to name curry as co-host of "today" - nyt
lines_and_colors: nbc news is expected to announce on monday that ann curry will become co-host of its morning television show "today," according to the new york times.
